Title: Researcher's Diary
Text:
Hello, passerby.
If you can, please take two minutes to try out the device in front of you, it will allow you to experience what it's like to be transformed into a butterfly and soar freely, and in the meantime, your use of it will allow you to collect experimental data for me.

[Explanation of Experimental Principle
It's too long to read.
I have analyzed a stable flying Echo from multiple Tingyos, broken down the information Spectrum into a solution to the level of genetic information, and used Naritsugu to combine with that information to replicate the Forte force of a TD, at which point the user of the Echo will be able to manipulate the Naritsugu in order to replicate the Forte force of the corresponding TD or Mutant Organism.

If you are interested, you can come to the Institute to sit in on my Echo sessions. Contact information: No exact location or time, just ask when you come (classes are often closed due to low turnout).
